body: Well, I think that is time to make an AMA. So go ask me.
body_tagged: Well, I think that is time to make an AMA. So go ask me.
title: SrZeref's AMA

replies.body: I know that one person will ask me that. Well is a large history. I was banned in OCN, so I was searching for other servers, which could have same gamemodes. I find a lot of server. Until I was searching I bought 2 more accounts... They got banned. One of the accounts i sold it, the other is my sub account called Artcer. So one day I find Avicus. And I start playing here, so since 9-10 months I'm playing here.
replies.body_tagged: I know that one person will ask me that. Well is a large history. I was banned in OCN, so I was searching for other servers, which could have same gamemodes. I find a lot of server. Until I was searching I bought 2 more accounts... They got banned. One of the accounts i sold it, the other is my sub account called Artcer. So one day I find Avicus. And I start playing here, so since 9-10 months I'm playing here.
